title: Big Five Personality Test
home_description: The Big Five personality test is a scientific assessment that measures five key dimensions of your personality. This version uses the IPIP-NEO-120 inventory, a well-validated instrument based on decades of psychological research.
results_ai_description: Get a personalized AI-generated description of your personality based on your test results.
results_ai_loading_hint: This usually takes about a minute...
results_context_placeholder: A few sentences about your life, work, hobbies, or anything that helps paint a fuller picture...
results_context_hint: Adding context helps the AI provide more personalized and relevant insights.
